title: Blood Ocean
description: Experience the recovered, critically acclaimed blood thirsty carnage of a motion picture from the brutal minds of Dethklok. Space vikings, serial killers, an oil rig with a haunted crypt, and more.
altHero: Nathan Explosion sinks into the blood ocean holding up his arm wearing a futuristic gauntlet
alt1: William Murderface sitting on an inflated raft on the blood ocean
alt2: Skwisgaar Skwigelf as a space Viking floating through space on a Viking ship
alt3: Pickles wearing a karate uniform in front of an oil rig in the blood ocean
alt4: Nathan Explosion sitting on the raft in the blood ocean
